artist: Hashiguchi Goyō; Carved by Maeda Kentarō; Printed by Imai Danshi; Posthumously produced by Hashiguchi Yasuo
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: crouching woman with one foot under her body, one foot in front; grey ground
marks: 大正九年十月 {Taishō kunen jūgatsu} (October 1920) 五葉画 {Goyō ga} (picture by Goyō)
title: Woman Cutting Her Toenails
